titleStmt.title: Phisicke for the soule verye necessarie to be vsed in the agonie of death, and in those extreme and moste perillous seasons, aswell for those, which are in good health, as those, which are endewed with bodily sicknesse. Translated out of Latine into Englishe, by H. Thorne.
titleStmt.author: John Chrysostom, Saint, d. 407. De patientia et de consumatione huius sæculi, de secundo advento. aut
Thorne, Henry, fl. 1567-1584.

notesStmt.note: Includes a translation, by Henry Thorne, of: Chrysostom, St. John. De patientia et de consumatione huius sæculi, de secundo advento.
Identified as STC 19895a on UMI microfilm.
Slight print show-through; folios 103 mutilated; all after I6 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
